title: Debugger
description: This game is riddled with bugs, shoot them down before they corrupt your computer!

title: Hellhook
description: Vanquish demons using a magnetic hook to score big. Student group project made for an arcade controller.

title: Swapper
description: Swapper is a first-person puzzle game with it's main mechanic being swapping the players position with objects in the room.

title: Memory Game
description: Simple memory game, click the matching animals!

title: Countdown Scheduler
description: A simple app that tracks events and displays a countdown

title: Chinese Zodiac Lookup
description: An app that lets users explore their Chinese zodiac sign
